title: 11/03/20 HOUR 1- Tony Dungy
itunes:title: 11/03/20 HOUR 1- Tony Dungy
description:
Tony Dungy tells Dan that he does not like refs picking up their flags after they have decided to throw it. Tony says that the referee system needs consistency.
